I am about to depart for a two week vacation, so replies to questions/ 
comments about Heritrix will take a while. Please do continue to post  
your experiences/concerns with Heritrix 2.0 while I am away, and I'll  
answer everyone when I return on January 2.

Happy holidays everyone!

-Paul
